document_data.name: Jemmy Kirschtorte
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jemmy Kirschtorte''' was a young [[sorceress]] daughter of [[Nell Kirschtorte]], a baker from the hamlet of [[Liam's Hold]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].

{{quote|The girl hasâ€¦ unusual talents and I found myself drawn to her against my will. She commands a creature of the night, and I found it incredible that she is able to command it with more authority than myself... I am sure that when she grows older she will command power enough that could lay waste to this village in the flicker of an eye, but that day is not yet come.|[[Sieronius Dethick]] talking about Jemmy.}}
document_data.Description: Jemmy was a young girl with long brown hair. She had a curious and intense personality and a defiant streak.
document_data.Abilities: Jemmy's sorcerous gift manifested quite early. She discovered the ability to ''[[speak with animals]]'' and befriended a smart little [[bat]] she named [[Mr. Barnabus]]. She also possessed a gift of seeing; she drew pictures of people, faraway places, and the people she observed while flying around in her dreams.
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, Jemmy, along with her mother, became targeted by an ancient [[drow]] [[vampire]] named [[Sieronius Dethick]]. The bloodsucking creature had been trapped underneath the hamlet of Liam's Hold centuries prior and could not escape unless his ''[[curse]]'' was broken. And the ''curse'' could only be lifted by the drow's wife. The vampire attempted to mesmerize Mr. Barnabus, but the bat was too attached to the young sorceress to leave her side. The undead was attracted to Jemmy's gift. He visited the girl under cover of night, seeping in fog form through the floorboards into the bakery. Mr. Barnabus witnessed these visits and informed Jemmy of the strange man. For a while, the vampire communicated with the young sorceress via dreams, giving her nightmares. One night, Jemmy saw the man sitting on her bed and shooed him away. Later, Sieronius Dethick attempted to take Nell Kirschtorte, but Mr. Barnabus woke Jemmy. When Sieronius arrived, he saw the girl was awake and left Kirschtorte household to find another wife.
